General.Name: Somi Conveyor Beltings Limited
General.Description: Somi Conveyor Beltings Limited manufactures and sells industrial conveyor belts for commercial, industrial, and consumer markets in India and internationally. It provides fire resistant and oil resistant conveyor belts. The company also offers various conveyor belts, such as bullet proof, fusion, chevron, and rough top, as well as rubber sheets and mattings. It primarily serves the sponge iron, power, and mining sectors. Somi Conveyor Beltings Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Jodhpur, India.
